title: Why Ferrari will suffer F1 if team boss Vasseur really is under threat
summary: The inability of the rear damper to control the Ferrari’s ride height has snowballed into a tricky political situation for team principal Frédéric Vasseur, one in which he may be…

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary function of a rear damper in a Formula 1 car?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To control the car's ride height and manage suspension dynamics.
wrong_options: To increase tire grip on the track.

qa_pairs.question: Who is the current team principal of Scuderia Ferrari as of the 2023 season?
What could be a potential consequence of a team principal being under threat in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It can lead to instability within the team and affect performance.
wrong_options: Increased funding for new car development.
Guaranteed performance improvements in the next race.
